title: Bring your pet home to 4800 Excelsior! We accept pets!
posting_body: ['4800 Excelsior', 'Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2', 'Square Footage: 1205 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2825', 'Up to one month free!', 'Contact the leasing office for more information', 'Community Description', 'Our exquisitely designed studio, 1 & 2 bedroom floor plans are bright, fresh, and modern.', 'Home chefs will love our elegant kitchens featuring gorgeous granite countertops, designer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, hardwood-style flooring, and generous central islands.', "You'll appreciate the special details that elevate your home including grand ceilings, crown molding, floor-to-ceiling windows that invite in plenty of natural light, and open living rooms that flow onto your private patio or balcony where you can enjoy the fresh air and the surrounding city views.", 'Our elegant bathrooms feature luxurious garden-style bathtubs with curved shower rods and modern fixtures.', 'The spacious bedrooms boast walk-in closets with mirrored doors, ceiling fan light fixtures, and all our apartments have central heating and air conditioning, and full-sized washers and dryers.', 'Community Amenities', '◾ 2 Elevators', '◾ Bike Storage', '◾ Coffee Station', '◾ Conference Room', '◾ Fireplace Lounge', '◾ Recycling', '◾ Resident Lounge', '◾ Rooftop Courtyard', '◾ Rooftop Terrace', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '◾ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Controlled Access Building', '◾ Directly Above Fresh Thyme Farmers Market', '◾ On-site Maintenance & Management', '◾ Planned Resident Events', '◾ Reservable Clubhouse', '◾ Rooftop Pool & Spa', '◾ Underground Heated Parking', 'Unit Features', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Energy Star Certified Appliances', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Pantry', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '4800 Excelsior Blvd', 'Saint Louis Park, MN 55416', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs Allowed: 75 lb Weight Limit.', '2 Pet Limit.', '$300 Refundable Deposit, $300 Non-Refundable Fee, $30/month/pet.', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DF5FD8C6610444CC']
